skill.name: reasoning
skill.description: Core reasoning capabilities always available to agents

skill.name: docker-python-best-practices
skill.description: Use when Python Docker images are excessively large (>800MB), build times are slow due to redundant dependency installation, or security audits require non-root execution and minimal attack surfaces. Apply these practices when transitioning a Python application from local development to production-ready containerization.

skill.name: recursive-language-models
skill.description: Use when standard LLM generation fails on complex logic, math, or coding tasks due to 'one-pass' limitations. This skill provides the framework for implementing iterative reasoning loops, process-based verification (PRMs), and path optimization strategies like MCTS to scale inference-time compute for high-reasoning accuracy.

skill.name: context-management
skill.description: Essential context management capabilities for stateful operations

skill.name: tool-integration
skill.description: Essential tool integration capabilities for MCP toolchains

skill.name: ephemeral-memory-protocol
skill.description: A markdown-based protocol for managing temporary, session-specific information. to prevent context clutter in local AI interactions.

skill.name: interaction-history
skill.description: Memory block for interaction history continuity

skill.name: project-context
skill.description: Memory block for project-level context continuity

skill.name: ty-type-checker
skill.description: Use when type checking is slow, migrating from Mypy/Pyright, or integrating with the Ruff/UV ecosystem without complex plugin dependencies.

skill.name: shadcn-custom-registry
skill.description: Architect and distribute an organizational design system using the shadcn/uiregistry pattern, allowing teams to install custom components via the shadcn CLI.

skill.name: fastapi-production-patterns
skill.description: Use when building FastAPI apps with async database operations, complex dependency injection, partial update endpoints, async testing, or converting Python utilities to API endpoints

skill.name: fastapi-pytest-workflow
skill.description: Standardized workflow and fixtures for isolated unit testing in FastAPI, including SQLAlchemy session mocking and pyfakefs integration.

skill.name: astral-ty-integration
skill.description: Standardized workflow for integrating Astral's 'ty' type checker into existing Python projects, focusing on incremental adoption and high-performance CI/CD pipelines.

skill.name: react-vite-production-setup
skill.description: A comprehensive workflow for initializing and configuring a production-ready React SPA using Vite, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and TanStack Query with a feature-based architecture.

skill.name: tavily-rest-api-tool
skill.description: A Python implementation of a REST API wrapper for the Tavily Search service, designed to provide structured web search capabilities to AI agents.
